extendedInfo.description: Thank you for your interest in the Central Taxis Edinburgh Android App.This App allows you to book a Black Hackney Cab from Central Taxis, Edinburgh's largest black cab fleet.You can:Get a Quotation for your journeyMake a bookingCheck its statusCancel a bookingTrack the vehicle on a mapManage your previous bookingsManage your favourite addressesThe App is intended for U.K. use only, and therefore all addresses are restricted to within the U.K.

reviews.title: Syncing errors.
reviews.comment: Have used this for a while and its been great, but for the last two weeks have also been experiencing syncing errors. Please fix. Update: after testing it seems the app switches to a basic connection therefore is unable to connect to the server.
reviews.author: Catherine E

reviews.title: Sparky
reviews.comment: Great App for booking your Black Taxi in Edinburgh.
reviews.author: mark huggins

reviews.title: Syncing with server
reviews.comment: All this app says these days is syncing with server.  :/ Please fix.
reviews.author: Christopher Williamson
